#summary The img galleryimg attribute
#labels about-html,is-html-attribute,from-microsoft

You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HTMLReference HTML Reference] > [HTMLElements Elements] > [ImgElement <img> element] > *galleryimg attribute*

== Usage ==

Despite what MSDN says, the `galleryimg` attribute is reflected in the DOM as `element.galleryimg`, not `element.galleryImg`.

== Values ==

== Elements ==

You can use the `galleryimg` attribute on the following elements:

  * [ImgElement <img>]
